function.name: get_signals
function.description: Retrieves the latest smart money signals from the Base Signal Feed.

function.name: get_token_score
function.description: Retrieves the smart money score for a given token from the Base Signal Feed.

token_address.description: The contract address of the token on Base L2.

function.name: get_new_pairs
function.description: Retrieves recently detected new trading pairs on Base L2 from the Base Signal Feed.

function.name: check_health
function.description: Checks the health status of the Base Signal Feed API.
